flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Here you will construct awindmill/waterwheel out of some very simple parts.
guide.introduction_rendered: Here you will construct awindmill/waterwheel out of some very simple parts.
guide.summary: Here is a simple way to make a windmill/waterwheel using some common household parts. It can create energy or use a battery to make it go.
guide.title: Windmill
